ListDatabase Request¶

GET /Database/list¶

This post request returns database connection data (except password)

Example request:

GET /Database/List HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: application/json
Request Headers

  • admin_token – Admin token.

Example response:

  HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  Vary: Accept
  Content-Type: application/json

  {
    "List": [
        "database-local-name-1",
        "database-local-name-2",
        "database-local-name-3",
        "database-local-name-4"
    ],
    "status": "success"
}
Status Codes

  • 200 OK – No errors.

  • 403 Forbidden – Access denied. Check admin token in a header.

  • 400 Bad Request – Bad request. Check request body.

  • 404 Not Found – Database not found
